Product Description
Three disc box on Columbia featuring 62 tracks, all digitally remastered from the original master tapes using 20-bit Super Bit Mapping technology, from both their years on CBS & Island. Includes the smashes 'All The Young Dudes','All The Way From Memphis', 'Roll Away The Stone' & 'Honaloochie Boogie'. Packaged in a 6 x 10in hardback digi-book, it also contains a 56 page booklet with a chronology, discography, track by track analysis, dozens of previously unpublished photos and commentary, quotes & insights from band members.
